activities: Syncano provides a platform for developers to build, test and implement applications that facilitate sharing of electronic information, including personal data, across multiple devices and servers, often across national boundaries. Syncano may have access to such personal data for testing, quality assurance, and support.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Healthcare, financial information and other personally identifiabble infroamtion that may include manually processed data
recoursemech: Syncano has retained BBB EU Safe Harbor as an independent dispute resolution forum. The BBB EU Safe Harbor reference number for this retention is EU1657502-16-15
